main event: Witness reported seeing a UFO in Newfield, New York, in October 1967, claiming to have observed 120 UFOs in the fall of 1957, with one landing in a field.
interesting points: The witness has seen a large object descend near two houses with red and white lights and strange markings., The object had two windows through which the witness saw aliens seated at an instrument panel., Dr. J. Allen Hynek attended a meeting regarding the sightings and provided insights on UFO sightings., Numerous residents expressed sincerity in their UFO sightings despite lack of verification., The investigation found no substantial evidence to confirm the claims of the UFO presence.
sighted object: UFO resembling a saucer with red and white lights
witness description: One witness described the UFO having a glowing exterior and flashing lights; others gave similar accounts from their backyards.
